kulembetsa: Malo ang'onoang'ono, othamanga kwambiri mkati mwa CPU
unit control: Amagwirizanitsa zochita za zigawo za kompyuta
werengani kukumbukira kokha: Amasunga malangizo omwe ndi ofunikira kuti kompyuta iyambe
cache memory: Memory yaying'ono, yachangu pafupi ndi CPU kuti mufike mwachangu
kukula kwa mawu: Kuchuluka kwa ma bits omwe CPU imatha kukonza nthawi imodzi
payipi: Njira pomwe CPU imaphwanya malangizo m'magawo kuti agwire angapo nthawi imodzi
multiprocessing: Kugwiritsa ntchito ma CPU angapo kapena ma cores kuti mugwire ntchito nthawi imodzi
sokoneza: Chizindikiro chomwe chimayimitsa kwakanthawi CPU kuti igwire chochitika
pafupifupi kukumbukira: Njira yogwiritsira ntchito hard disk space ngati chowonjezera cha RAM
zamoyo: Basic Input/Output System, fimuweya yomwe imayambitsa zida zoyambira poyambira
ndi/o port: Adilesi yapakompyuta yolumikizirana ndi zida zotumphukira
woyendetsa chipangizo: Mapulogalamu omwe amalola makina ogwiritsira ntchito kuwongolera chipangizo
kutha: Dongosolo lomwe ma byte amasungidwa mu kukumbukira
Network protocol: Mndandanda wa malamulo ndi miyezo yolumikizirana pakati pa zida
paketi: Dongosolo laling'ono la data lomwe limatumizidwa pa netiweki
rauta: Chipangizo chomwe chimatumiza mapaketi pakati pa maukonde osiyanasiyana
subnet mask: Amagwiritsidwa ntchito kudziwa ma netiweki ndi magawo a ma adilesi a IP
topology: Kukonzekera kwa zida ndi zolumikizira mu netiweki
mtundu wa seva ya kasitomala: Kapangidwe ka maukonde komwe makasitomala amapempha zothandizira kuchokera ku maseva
dma: Kufikira kukumbukira molunjika, kumalola zida kusamutsa deta popanda kugwiritsa ntchito CPU
